column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////While in Houston I stopped in for dinner due to the great reviews
column2: and this place did not disappoint! I got the chef's special ramen (spicy miso) with a seasoned egg and add on salad and pork dumplings. Food is super
column3: super good! Chalon is a great bartender
column4: she made me a specialty drink that was the perfect compliment. I'll be back!!
